com.lpoo.game.view.entities

Class ShapeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lpoo.game.view.entities.ShapeView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlatformView

    public abstract class ShapeView
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Class used to represent the View of a Shape.
